content: I have a profile-on-profile situation where Forge refuses to open my profile because it cannot find the base profile, even though it is open in Forge already. How do I get around this? For reproduction see https://github.com/Nictiz/MedMij-STU3/blob/master/zib-LaboratoryTestResult/zib-LaboratoryTestResult-Observation.xml that relies on https://github.com/Nictiz/MedMij-STU3/blob/master/nl-core-observation.xml
I had this issue yesterday. Closing and reopening Forge helped...

Thanks. Alas no dice.

2017-05-09T12:12:47
Forge Forge 15.7 for HL7 FHIR STU3
Madrid 2017 Edition

FHIR Version: FHIR .NET API library for 3.0.0
